All these boards are based on the Gergo, so follow the Gergo build guide and use these for the locations of various components!

BuzzSaw

For the Firmware grab the development jazz from my github. These keymaps will change and please submit a PR! Once they’re stable they’ll be merged into QMK master.

git clone https://github.com/germ/qmk_firmware.git
git checkout gboards-update
